data.title: THE ELIZABETH GUEST HOUSE, KROONSTAD
data.meta_description: The Elizabeth Guest House in Kroonstad, Free State, offers Bed & Breakfast or Self-Catering Accommodation with Conference Venue.
data.text:
The Elizabeth Guest House in Kroonstad, Free State, offers Bed & Breakfast or Self-Catering Accommodation with Conference Venue

The Elizabeth Guest House is situated in the heart of Free State, in one of the friendliest towns, Kroonstad. Situated just off the N1 halfway between Johannesburg and Bloemfontein. Kroonstad is located on the banks of the Vals River, and offers visitors a range of activities and attractions ranging from the famous Jukskei Park to the Boskoppie Lion Farm.

The Elizabeth Guest House - Accommodation

All 14 rooms are luxury en-suite with bath & shower or just shower, and they are furnished either with one or two double beds.

We offer Self Catering and Bed & Breakfast Facilities with Dinner on request.

Room Facilities:

Room features:

Own private entrance

Basic guest amenities

Linen & towels

Air-conditioning

Free WIFI

Free standing desk with study lamp

Coffee & Tea station

Microwave & Mini Fridge

TV with selected DSTV channels

Non Smoking

Please contact our office for our prices: 056 213 2929.

The Elizabeth Guest House - Meals

Breakfast

Our tastefully prepared Full English Breakfast are enjoyed & served in the dining area each morning between 07h00 & 09h00 on weekdays. Earlier breakfasts can be arranged upon request. Filter coffee, tea, juice, a variety of cereals, yogurt & fruit along with a hot breakfast is served daily.

Others Meals

Our home-cooked hearty dinners are ever popular, especially for those frequent travellers tired of restaurant or take-out meals. Evening meals are prepared on prior request - 12hours prior notice. Dinner is served from 18h00 until 20h00 either in our dining room or in the comfort of your own room.

We also offer braai packs with side dishes for those who would like to braai. Lunch packs and/or Light Lunches can be arranged on request.

All other meals are available at an extra charge:

Dinner / R150

Lunch / Lunch Packs / R95

The Elizabeth Guest House - Services & Facilities

Full English breakfast daily

Dinner, Lunch & Lunch packs on request

Portable braai on request

Secure Parking within the property - provision made for under roof parking bays

Access Controlled Gate

Laundry facilities - available from Monday to Friday

Credit Card Facilities

On-site catering for corporate or private events

Conferencing facility

The Elizabeth Guest House - Conference Facility

Our conference room is ideal for small to medium conferences, workshops, presentations or meetings. The venue can accommodate up to 30 delegates.

The venue is equipped with:

Wi-Fi

HDMI connectivity to a data projector with a large white background

Accessible plug points

A fixed USB port to charge any smart phone anytime during your meeting

Sufficient lighting to suit your specific requirements

A flipchart that can be used as a whiteboard together with markers

Also included:

Notepads & pens

Mints

Arrival, mid-morning and Afternoon snack platters

Tea, coffee, juice & water

Please feel free to contact us for further information on our conference package.

Directions to The Elizabeth Guest House in Kroonstad

From the N1, take the off-ramp - R76 / South Road. (Do not take the Reitz Street / Kroonstad Off- ramp on the N1). At the stop turn Right towards town on the South Road and travel to the first circle.

Go ¾ way around the circle (3rd Exit) and turn the first sharp Right into Loubser Street. Travel 300m to the first stop street and turn Right into Borchardt Crescent.

The Elizabeth is on your left-hand side (entrance around the corner).

The Elizabeth Guest House, Kroonstad GPS Co-ordinates: S27°40.914' E027°14.465'
